hero.title: Build Your Next Project
hero.description: NextStart is a modern, production-ready boilerplate with Supabase, shadcn/ui, and all the tools you need to ship fast.

features.title: Everything You Need
features.subtitle: Production-Ready Features
features.description: Built with modern tools and best practices for rapid development

list.title: Next.js 16 App Router
list.description: Latest Next.js with server components, streaming, and optimized performance.

list.title: Supabase Integration
list.description: Complete authentication, database, and real-time features out of the box.

list.title: shadcn/ui Components
list.description: 48+ beautiful, accessible components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS.

list.title: TypeScript Strict Mode
list.description: Full type safety with strict TypeScript configuration and auto-generated types.

list.title: Internationalization
list.description: Multi-language support with next-intl for seamless localization.

list.title: Dark Mode
list.description: Beautiful dark mode with next-themes and automatic system preference detection.

list.title: Form Validation
list.description: React Hook Form with Zod schema validation for type-safe forms.

list.title: Code Quality
list.description: Biome for linting and formatting, ensuring consistent code quality.

list.title: Developer Experience
list.description: Hot reload, TypeScript, ESLint, and Prettier configured for optimal DX.

preview.title: See It In Action
preview.subtitle: Code Examples
preview.description: Real-world examples of authentication, API routes, and deployment

showcase.title: Try It Yourself
showcase.description: Interact with real features included in the boilerplate. Everything you see here is ready to use.

cta.title: Ready to Build Something
